name: pnp-list-formatting-reorder-expand-board-items
title: Reorder and Expand Board Items
shortDescription: This sample allow users to manage card order in Board Views and also enables expanding and collapsing images. This sample has the option 'Move to Top' that allows users to move cards to the top of the board view as a way to rearrange card positions.
longDescription: This sample allow users to manage card order in Board Views and also enables expanding and collapsing images. This sample has the option 'Move to Top' that allows users to move cards to the top of the board view as a way to rearrange card positions.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
